name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程介紹物理學的基本觀念,並訓練學生運用這些基本觀念來解決科學問題, 內容包括線動量,轉動,力矩,角動量,靜力平衡,簡諧運動,及波等主題
schedule:
1. Center of mass and linear momentum (I)
2. Center of mass and linear momemtum (II)
3. Rotation (I)
4. Rotation (II)
5. Review
6. Exam 1
7. Equilibrium and elasticity (I)
8. Equilibrium and elasticity  (II)
9. Fluids (I)
10. Fluids (II)
11. Exam 2
12. Oscillations (I)
13. Oscillations (II)
14. Waves (I)
15. Waves (II)
16. Review
17. Exam 3
materials:
”Fundamentals of Physics” by Halliday, Rensnick and Walker
10th Edition, Wiley (歐亞書局)
